title.rendered: Lake Ave Drama Club Performances on March 10 & 11

content.rendered: The Lake Ave Drama Club is hard at work in rehearsals for its upcoming show, We Are Monsters! Costumes are coming together, our songs are sounding out of this species, our dances are scarier than a pumpkin, and our lines are… wait, what’s my line? You won’t want to miss our monster cabaret coming up this March 10th and 11th at 7:00 Be there or be monster food!
